name: Super - Lastic™
description: Super - Lastic™ is Superior Thinset Mortar with Polymer Modification. A polymer-modified Portland cement mortar with a medium bed for ceramic, porcelain, quarry, marble, pavers, and other natural stone tile installations. Super - Lastic™ is the mortar of choice for professional installers due to its exceptional bond strength, versatility, and ease of use.
